General.Name: Hengtong Logistic Co Ltd
General.Description: Hengtong Logistics Co., Ltd. engages in the logistics business in China. The company is involved in transportation of general cargo, liquid caustic soda, liquefied natural gas (LNG), and hazardous chemicals through the fleet of approximately 480 vehicles; construction and operation of ports; logistics, distribution, and sale of LNG and liquefied petroleum gas (LPG); and gas station operation businesses. It also provides driver training, car rental, and hoisting services. The company was formerly known as Longkou Hengtong Transportation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hengtong Logistics Co., Ltd. in December 2011. Hengtong Logistics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Yantai, China.

3.Name: Mr. Renquan  Wang
3.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
